name: title-generator
description: Generate titles using multiple AI providers with smart filename handling

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release-help: echo 'Available release commands:' && echo '  npm run check-cdn    - Check CDN status and asset accessibility' && echo '  npm run check-local  - Test local files before release' && echo '  npm run force-release - Recreate latest release to fix CDN issues' && echo '  npm run build        - Build plugin assets' && echo 'For BRAT: Use repository rlaksana/title-generator'

author: Richard Laksana
